mapper.select: SELECT C.PRODUCT_NAME as product_name, B.ORDER_QUANTITY as ORDER_QUANTITY, A.ORDER_NO as ORDER_NO, A.ORDER_DATE as ORDER_DATE, A.TOTAL_PRICE as TOTAL_PRICE FROM O_ORDER A, O_ORDER_LIST B, PRODUCT C WHERE A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO AND B.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO AND PRODUCT_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY A.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT A.ORDER_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, C.PRODUCT_NAME, A.ORDER_ADDRESS, A.RECEIVER_NAME, A.ORDER_DATE, B.ORDER_QUANTITY, A.TOTAL_PRICE FROM O_ORDER A, O_ORDER_LIST B, PRODUCT C WHERE A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO AND B.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO AND A.ORDER_NO = #{ order_no }
